strapiPost.title: Beer & Hotdogs At 'Concert Before The Concert'
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by First National Bank of NWA
strapiPost.content:
First National Bank of NWA is hosting a free "concert before the concert" on June 9 in Rogers, complete with beer, hotdogs, and cornhole. 

  • Community party: The bank is celebrating its 150th birthday this year with a tailgate party at the Founders Plaza Terrace before the Jimmy Buffett concert at the AMP in Rogers. 
  • Be together: The pre-concert concert band is 412 West, a world-class rock band that brings their own groovy flavor to all the songs that make you want to sing along. There will be cool swag and everyone is welcome from 4-7p, whether attending the concert at the AMP or not. Don't forget the beer and hotdogs!

Learn more HERE.
